title: Barbershop font
content:
Thnaks in advance for your help!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Screen shot 2013-07-11 at 12.08.41 PM.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828223210/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20shot%202013-07-11%20at%2012.08.41%20PM.png) | 232.75 KB |
author: jharrison

comments.content: Looks like [Trade Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828223210/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/trade-gothic) Condensed Bold (#20) customized (median spurs and drop shadow).
Bummer, was hoping this already existed. Thanks!

To customize Trade Gothic by adding spurs to match your image, a good model for the spurs is Michael Hagemann's well executed [Cowboy Western](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828223210/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontmesa/cowboy-western/).  
Don
